title: Ep 69: Body Positive Vibes with Sophia Carter-Kahn
itunes:title: Ep 69: Body Positive Vibes with Sophia Carter-Kahn
itunes:subtitle: This week Kate and Doree celebrate the most wonderful time of the year: Sephora Sale Season! They discuss dream purchases, old favorites, and some possible items they may snag when that Sephora Beauty Insider discount kicks in.Then they welcome Sophia...
description:
This week Kate and Doree celebrate the most wonderful time of the year: Sephora Sale Season! They discuss dream purchases, old favorites, and some possible items they may snag when that Sephora Beauty Insider discount kicks in.

Then they welcome Sophia Carter-Kahn, writer and co-creator of the podcast She’s All Fat. She talks body positivity, rejecting diet culture, how to advocate for yourself at the doctor, the life-changing power of a good pillow, and her favorite face oil.

Follow us on Instagram: @Forever35podcast, @katespencer, @doree, Twitter: @forever35pod, and in our Facebook group (password is "serums"). All products mentioned on the show can be found on our website , Forever35podcast.com. To leave us a voicemail, call 781-591-0390, or you can email us at forever35podcast@gmail.com.

This episode is sponsored by:

  • Baked By Melissa - Get 15% off delicious bite-sized cupcakes when you go to bakedbymelissa.com and use promo code FOREVER35.
  • ThirdLove - Visit thirdlove.com/forever to receive 15% off your first purchase.
  • LOLA - Save 40% on all subscriptions when you visit mylola.com and use promo code FOREVER35.
  • FabFitFun - Get $10 off your first box at fabfitfun.com when you use promo code FOREVER35.
  • Daily Harvest - Get THREE free cups in your first box when you visit daily-harvest.com and enter promo code FOREVER35.


Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
